skins.shipDescription: Queen Elizabeth-class battleship - Queen Elizabeth, Hull Number 00!
skins.selfIntroduction: I am the super-dreadnought of the Royal Navy. Make sure to remember my name! My military achievements? I let my subjects take care of those kind of things. I simply need to watch them do their work!
skins.acquisition: Are you the commander? You are still 100,000 years too early to command me! Well, I shall be generous and give you a chance... From this day on, you will be one of my faithful servants!
skins.login: Despicable, to have me wait on you for so long!
skins.details: Peasant! Who permitted you to peak?! I-I have not prepared myself yet...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Being petite is a noble characteristic, understand?
skins.secretaryIdle2: You're saying I bumped into you? That's because you didn't make way for the Queen!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Do not touch my belly, it's rude!
skins.secretaryTouch: Please do not touch our noble body so casually
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: W-wait... You fool, what are you doing?! I-I'll sentence you to death!

skins.shipDescription: Hah haah! You're a lucky servant this evening! We shall allow you to accompany us to the party! ... B-but it's not like I chose you because I like you! I just... Yes! I just sort of chose randomly! Got it?!
skins.acquisition: Hah haah! You're a lucky servant this evening! We shall allow you to accompany us to the party! ... B-but it's not like I chose you because I like you! I just... Yes! I just sort of chose randomly! Got it?!
skins.details: We shall allow you to bask in our splendor! ... Now out with your praise already! Lowly servant!
skins.secretaryIdle1: So as not to embarrass me at the party, you need to practice your dancing! Y-you could practice with m-... You don't want to bother me?! B-b-but it really wouldn't be much trouble!
skins.secretaryIdle2: It is a servant's duty to clear the way for the Queen, are we clear?!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Bel! Is everything ready for the party? N-not that I'm excited about it or anything! I'm just supervising my maids!
skins.secretaryTouch: Hm, hmph! ... Considering the lengths to which you went for this party, we shall overlook your boorishness for now. Be grateful for your queen's leniency! Lowly servant!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Aie! Warspite!! Level your fifteen-inch guns at this insolent servant! Off with its heeaaaaaad!!

skins.shipDescription: Now this is a stage worthy of our majesty! You are not to leave our sight, servant! Let your passions burn for me!
skins.acquisition: Now this is a stage worthy of our majesty! You are not to leave our sight, servant! Let your passions burn for me!
skins.login: Hah hah! Spread the word, servant! Let all be dazzled by our splendour!
skins.secretaryIdle1: "Grovel before me, servant!" ...Hm? It feels a bit different from usual...?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Like so...? Is this cuter? Very good then, well done, Matchless. My servant will be blown away!
skins.secretaryIdle3: A maid idol...? What is it Bel and Gloucester have been teaching you?
skins.secretaryTouch: Encore? Heh heh. I could give you a few more!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Watch your hands, servant! Or it's the oubliette for you!

skins.shipDescription: Hehe, behold the new outfit that I had Akashi make for me! Impressive, no? Prostrate yourself before the elegant charm of my school uniform, servant~?
skins.acquisition: Hehe, behold the new outfit that I had Akashi make for me! Impressive, no? Prostrate yourself before the elegant charm of my school uniform, servant~?
skins.login: Your Queen has arrived! Do make way, my subjects!
skins.details: Servant, do advise me on these "club activities." I have heard much commotion about "idols" or something like that...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Bel, where's my cake...? Servant, take Neptune with you and make yourself useful!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Warspite, how fares the tea party plans with Nagato and the others? Have George and the knights deliver the invites to them!
skins.secretaryIdle3: "Field trip?" Let us make our way to Sardegna! Have Veneto regale us with the most exquisite banquet!
skins.secretaryTouch: Did you go buy candy from the student store? Heh, even a noble such as myself must learn the tastes of commoners.

skins.ENClientName: Crown Jewel of the Royal Navy
skins.JPClientName: 金\のプレミアムロイヤル
